attributes.action: Keep Stratton Hospital, Cornwall open 24 hours a day.
attributes.background: Stratton minor injuries unit is due to shut over night from February 2019. This is extremely dangerous,and detrimental to the people in the local community it serves. The nearest hospitals are Barnstaple or Truro. These are over an hour away, so will cause extra strain and impact on the patient

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of Cornwall Partnership NHS Foundation Trust, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You can find out how to contact the Trust here:

https://www.cornwallft.nhs.uk/contact/
